      Re-draw the player in its updated position.

      Return x-position of player (upper left corner, x-coordinate)

      Return y-position of player (upper left corner, y-coordinate)
      int getScore()
      Return the score from the player for display This method is called by the associated ball court object when updating the score text line.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(BallCourt bc,
              int xStart,
              int yStart,
              int maxVelY)
        Constructor for a player
        Parameters:
        bc - reference to the ball court the player is in
        xStart - Position vector (x-coordinate of upper left courner of the box)
        yStart - Position vector (y-coordinate of upper left courner of the box)
        maxVelY - Maximal speed in y-direction

      • draw

        Re-draw the player in its updated position.

      • getPosX

        public int getPosX()
        Return x-position of player (upper left corner, x-coordinate)

      • getPosY

        public int getPosY()
        Return y-position of player (upper left corner, y-coordinate)

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Return the score from the player for display This method is called by the associated ball court object when updating the score text line.
        Returns:
        Current score

      • incrementScore

        public void incrementScore()
        Increment the player score. This method is called by the ball object every time the player hits the ball.

      • move

        public void move()
        Calculat the next Delta-t step for the player
